name: Shake Shooter Multiplayer
description:
SHAKE SHOOTER MULTIPLAYER...

is a multiplayer co-op game. Join your friends and fight wave after wave of different enemies with varying abilities.

Important Notes:

To play online with other users, please make sure you are logged into steam on your PC.

  • To play single player, hit the "host" button
  • Select weapons with numbers 1-3
  • Stand next to a downed player for 10 seconds to revive them
  • The game automatically begins after 40 seconds
  • This game is best played with friends :)

p.s. Make sure you are on the same Steam region

p.p.s Alt F4 to close the game

Made by Brandon and Landen
